data.eml:eml: Similar look but different song: a new Cicadetta species in the montana complex (Insecta, Hemiptera, Cicadidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sueur, Jérôme, Puissant, Stéphane (2007): Similar look but different song: a new Cicadetta species in the montana complex (Insecta, Hemiptera, Cicadidae). Zootaxa 1442: 55-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176017
